H0.text: Where were the FIBA (Basketball) World Championships held in 2002. Indianapolis

H1.text: Where were the FIBA (Basketball) World Championships held in 2002. Beijing

H2.text: Where were the FIBA (Basketball) World Championships held in 2002. Madrid

H3.text: Where were the FIBA (Basketball) World Championships held in 2002. Indpls

A4.text: The tournament was held by the International Basketball Federation in Indianapolis, Indiana, United States, from August 29 to September 8, 2002.

A5.text: The tournament was not held in Beijing.
